system.requirement: If you wield an iklwa, a close-quarters, hand spear...

abilities.description:
When you are in position to @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} at an unsuspecting or completely vulnerable foe, choose one (before rolling).

  • Add +2 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
  • Inflict +2 harm on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} against a close-quarters fighting foe, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.12e23cfe23534a8f]{Turn the Tide} with a frenzy of slashing and piercing and your next move is a @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike}, add +1 and inflict +2 harm on a strong hit.
